languages.text: "Выжидать. Катакомбы мануфакторума необъятны — я затаюсь в них и буду ждать своего часа, пока не настанет момент вновь явиться пред тобой во плоти. А пока я жду, я подготовлю этот мир изнутри к тому, чтобы он принял Истину, когда придет время. Чтобы отворить глаза миру не нужны армии — достаточно посеять ростки скверны и подождать, пока они сами взойдут".

"Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."
languages.original_text: "Выжидать. Катакомбы мануфакторума необъятны — я затаюсь в них и буду ждать своего часа, пока не настанет момент вновь явиться пред тобой во плоти. А пока я жду, я подготовлю этот мир изнутри к тому, чтобы он принял Истину, когда придет время. Чтобы отворить глаза миру не нужны армии — достаточно посеять ростки скверны и подождать, пока они сами взойдут".

languages.text: “耐心等待。制造工厂地下空间非常广阔，我会躲在里面，等待时机，直到我再次以肉身形态出现在你面前为止。在我等待的这段期间，我会从内部改造这个世界，让它在时机成熟时接受真理。打开这个世界的眼睛并不需要什么军队，只要播撒腐化的种子，等待它自己慢慢发芽就够了。”
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."

traits.locale_text: “耐心等待。制造工厂地下空间非常广阔，我会躲在里面，等待时机，直到我再次以肉身形态出现在你面前为止。在我等待的这段期间，我会从内部改造这个世界，让它在时机成熟时接受真理。打开这个世界的眼睛并不需要什么军队，只要播撒腐化的种子，等待它自己慢慢发芽就够了。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Wartet. Die Verliese des Manufactorums sind riesig. Ich werde mich in ihnen verstecken und warten, bis der Augenblick gekommen ist, wieder in Fleisch und Blut vor Euch zu erscheinen. Und während ich warte, arbeite ich von innen heraus an dieser Welt, um sie darauf vorzubereiten, die Wahrheit zu akzeptieren, wenn die Zeit gekommen ist. Man braucht keine Armeen, um der Welt die Augen zu öffnen: Man muss lediglich die Saat der Verderbnis säen und warten, bis sie von alleine sprießt."
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."

Man braucht keine Armeen, um der Welt die Augen zu öffnen: Man muss lediglich die Saat der Verderbnis säen und warten, bis sie von alleine sprießt."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: «Esperar. Las mazmorras del manufactorum son vastas. Me refugiaré en ellas y aguardaré el momento propicio para comparecer ante ti en carne y hueso. Y mientras espero, trabajaré en este mundo desde dentro a fin de prepararlo para que acepte la Verdad cuando llegue la hora. No se necesitan ejércitos para abrir los ojos de la gente: basta con sembrar las semillas de la corrupción y esperar a que germinen por sí solas».
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."

traits.locale_text: «Esperar. Las mazmorras del manufactorum son vastas. Me refugiaré en ellas y aguardaré el momento propicio para comparecer ante ti en carne y hueso. Y mientras espero, trabajaré en este mundo desde dentro a fin de prepararlo para que acepte la Verdad cuando llegue la hora. No se necesitan ejércitos para abrir los ojos de la gente: basta con sembrar las semillas de la corrupción y esperar a que germinen por sí solas».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: « Patienter. Les souterrains du manufactorum sont vastes. Je m'y ferai discret en attendant mon heure puis, le moment venu, je me présenterai à nouveau devant vous en personne. Pendant ce temps, je travaillerai de l'intérieur pour préparer ce monde à accepter la vérité lorsqu'il le faudra. Nul besoin d'armées pour lui ouvrir les yeux : il suffit de semer les graines de la corruption et d'attendre qu'elles germent d'elles-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."

traits.locale_text: « Patienter. Les souterrains du manufactorum sont vastes. Je m'y ferai discret en attendant mon heure puis, le moment venu, je me présenterai à nouveau devant vous en personne. Pendant ce temps, je travaillerai de l'intérieur pour préparer ce monde à accepter la vérité lorsqu'il le faudra. Nul besoin d'armées pour lui ouvrir les yeux : il suffit de semer les graines de la corruption et d'attendre qu'elles germent d'elles-mêmes. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: 「待ってくれ。聖工場の地下牢は広大だ。俺はその中に身を潜め、再び生身でお前の前に姿を現す時が来るのを待つ。その間、俺はこの惑星を内側から調べ、時が来たら奴らが真実を受け入れられるよう準備をする。目を開かせるのに軍隊は必要ない。必要なのは、腐敗の種を蒔くことだ。あとはそれが自ら芽吹くのを待っていればいい」
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."

traits.locale_text: 「待ってくれ。聖工場の地下牢は広大だ。俺はその中に身を潜め、再び生身でお前の前に姿を現す時が来るのを待つ。その間、俺はこの惑星を内側から調べ、時が来たら奴らが真実を受け入れられるよう準備をする。目を開かせるのに軍隊は必要ない。必要なのは、腐敗の種を蒔くことだ。あとはそれが自ら芽吹くのを待っていればいい」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Bekleyeceğim. Manufaktorumun zindanları engindir. Orada saklanıp göze batmayacağım ve yeniden etimle kemiğimle karşına çıkmak için doğru zamanı bekleyeceğim. Beklerken de bu dünyayı içten hazır edeceğim, zamanı geldiğinde bu dünya da Hakikat'i kabul edecek. Bir dünyanın gözlerini açmak için ordulara ihtiyaç yoktur. Gereken tek şey, yozlaşmanın tohumlarını ekip kendi hızında yeşermesini beklemektir."
languages.original_text: "Wait. The manufactorum's dungeons are vast. I will lie low in them and bide my time until the moment comes for me to appear before you in the flesh again. And while I wait, I will work on this world from the inside to prepare it to accept the Truth when the time is due. One does not need armies to open the world's eyes: all it takes is to sow the seeds of corruption and wait for them to sprout of their own accord."
